menu.export: Exportar a un documento de texto

search-menu.extended-verse-boundaries: Exterder el límite del verso (dos versos)

module-assistant.internet-usage-note:
NOTA IMPORTANTE

{{module_type}} son instalados usando su conexión a internet.
si usted se encuentra en un lugar dónde los Cristianos enfrentan persecución,
usted NO debería usar este software debido al riesgo de ser detectado!
module-assistant.repo-data-last-updated: Los datos del repositorio se actualizaron el {{date}}.
module-assistant.repo-selection-info-text:
Ezra Project works with {{module_type}} provided by the SWORD project and the CrossWire Bible Society.

Below you see the list of SWORD repositories published by CrossWire. A repository is an internet storage location that contains a set of {{module_type}}. Next to each repository you see the total number of {{module_type}} available from that repository.

To install a module, select at least one repository from the list below. The CrossWire and eBible.org repositories are a good place to start.
module-assistant.more-repo-information-needed:
You need more information about these repositories?
Have a look at the CrossWire Wiki.
module-assistant.click-to-show-detailed-module-info: Click on a module code (link after module name) to show detailed information here.
module-assistant.updating-repository-data: Updating repository data! This will take a few seconds ...
module-assistant.update-repository-data-failed: Updating repository data failed! Are you offline?
module-assistant.pick-languages-from-repos: Please pick at least one of the languages available from the following repositories:
module-assistant.it-takes-time-to-install-translation: Note that it takes some time for each translation to be downloaded and then installed.
module-assistant.it-takes-time-to-install-dictionary: Note that it takes some time for each dictionary to be downloaded and then installed.
module-assistant.select-translations-to-be-removed:
Select the Bible translations that you would like to remove.

Disabled entries in the list are translations not installed in the users directory.
module-assistant.select-dictionaries-to-be-removed:
Select the dictionaries that you would like to remove.

Disabled entries in the list are dictionaries not installed in the user's directory or dictionaries that are essential for Ezra Project's functionality.
module-assistant.module-lock-info: This module is license-protected and requires that you purchase an unlock key from the content owner!
module-assistant.enter-unlock-key: {{moduleId}} is license protected. Please enter the unlock key!
module-assistant.unlock-failed: Unlock failed! Please enter the correct unlock key.

general.new-release-available-body: A new release of Ezra Project is available!
general.module-install-failed: failed. Are you connected to the Internet?

help.help-text-no-tags-book-opened:
To start working with tags, create your first tag by clicking on the button New tag.

After that you can browse the Bible text, click or drag-select verses and then assign the tag you just created.
help.help-text-no-tags-no-book-opened: To start working with tags, first select a Bible book to study.
help.help-text-translation-available: To start, select a book or a tag from the menu above.
help.help-text-no-translations:
To start, first install at least one Bible translation.

You can open the installation assistent by clicking on the settings icon and then Configure translations.

tags.really-delete: Do you really want to delete the following tag:
tags.tag-info-would-be-deleted: The tag information would be deleted for all associated verses!
tags.really-remove-tag-assignment: Do you really want to remove the tag "" from the selected verses?
tags.export-tagged-verse-list: Export tagged verse list to Word document
tags.title: Title

bible-browser.tag-hint: Click to show all verses with this tag
bible-browser.search-performance-hint: Only showing book list due to high number of search results. You can request the individual search results per book.
bible-browser.strongs-number-not-valid: This is not a valid Strong's number!
bible-browser.open-verselist-in-new-tab: Open verse list in new tab

dictionary-info-box.help-instruction:
How to show dictionary entries here:

  1. First open a translation with the Strong's feature.
  2. While you press the SHIFT key you can move your mouse over the individual words and phrases to see dictionary entries here.
